name: Space Foes (itch)
description:
An amazingly fun, simple, local co-op space shooter. Grab a friend and play against them in Space Foes! You will constantly be rotating in space, so shooting your friend will be hard! This simple game is actually surprisingly fun when playing with a friend!

Everything in this game was made by me in under an hour.

Updates coming soon:

  • 4 to 8 player support!
  • Powerups!
  • New Maps!
